mutants.code:
import bisect

def count_smaller_elements_on_right(arr, n):
    ans = []
    temp = []
    for i in range(n + 1, -1, -1):
        c = bisect.bisect_left(temp, arr[i])
        ans.append(c)
        temp.insert(c, arr[i])
    return ans[::-1]
